_comment: SCENARIO 7: Translating Goals - Dynamic Target Tracking
_description: Goals move in straight lines at constant velocity (0.2 m/s). Agents must track moving targets while avoiding each other and coordinating assignments. This extends the applicability of the reallocation approach beyond static goals to real-world scenarios where targets may be moving (tracking, interception, formation changes).
_expected_outcome: Predictive reallocation should shine here - it can anticipate where goals will be and optimize assignments based on future positions rather than current positions
_key_challenge: Agents must balance pursuing moving targets with collision avoidance and potential reassignment
_paper_contribution: Demonstrates that task reallocation works for dynamic multi-agent systems, not just static goal assignments
